name: Wii Color Swapping Animation File
summary: Color animation file used by Mario Kart Wii and other Nintendo Wii games; contains data referenced by the game to swap out different colors for animations, e.g., when Yoshi's egg gets darker before it breaks; typically found within a .BRRES resource package file with other files such as .CHR0 , .MDL0 , and .PAT0 files.
